A technique that incorporates the [[Rasengan]] with energy from the [[Stone of Gelel]]. It has been used alongside the [[Rasengan#Nine-Tails_Influence|Demon Fox Rasengan]] as part of the [[Twin Rasengan]]. Its power is presumed equal in strength to a Demon Fox Rasengan, as it can burn part of an opponent's body. It is bluish-green in colour.

[[pl:Gelel Rasengan]]
[[pt:Rasengan de Gelel]]
